original_title: Shounen Ninja Kaze no Fujimaru: Dai Saru Taiji
overview: Kidnapped and rescued by a Ninja, Fujimaru has mastered martial arts over the years. Now he sets off on a journey to find his mother and also locate an old tome containing secret martial arts techniques.
title: Shounen Ninja Kaze no Fujimaru: Dai Saru Taiji
